title: Sylas ulting Elise
body:
Hi,
I'm pretty sure it's not supposed to happen. When Sylas ults Elise he steals her R, and becomes a spider gaining all of her skills instead of just shapeshifting.

replies.body: All champions that have a shapeshift or enhancing ult cause Sylas to gain part of their kit.

Yeah this happens with Jayce too, he turns into a ranged champ for a while lol

Also nidalee, he gets all of her cougar abilities
As stated by others, this is working as intended and not a bug.
